name: Mind Manipulation
description: Manipulate, control, and damage the minds of others. Powerful, but requires restraint.

levels.duration: 1 min per power in Mind Manipulation
levels.effect: Calm or anger a target (Calm 1 or Anger 1).
Target makes Con vs your Wis. On fail: lose action (involuntary convulsion).
Force a target to speak 10 words. Opposed Wis check. Failure alerts target.
Mentally send a message to willing targets (cannot reply mentally).
Pacify a number of aggressive targets (oppose Wis in combat). Attack breaks effect.
Give targets disadvantage on Int and all opposed checks vs you.

levels.uses: Powers in Mind Manipulation รท 2 per day
levels.effect: Deal 1d12+Int brain damage.
Deal 1d8 psychic damage to up to Powers in Mind Manipulation targets.
Erase last 10 min from minds of up to Powers in Mind Manipulation targets. (non-combat only)
Force neutral target to aid (hide, lie, supply, etc). Not usable in combat.
Read target's thoughts. (non-combat only)
Self and all allies in range gain +5 to all rolls until end.

levels.uses: Powers in Mind Manipulation รท 3 per day
levels.effect: Allies in radius gain 8 temporary HP (does not stack).
Perceive time at 1/4 speed, +4 AR, +2 actions/turn. After use, cannot use Mind Manipulation for 2 days.

levels.duration: Until target dies or delusions disappear
levels.effect: Create delusions in target's mind, causing fear and movement/attack penalties. Delusions do psychic damage.

levels.duration: Hours = Powers in Mind Manipulation รท 4
levels.effect: Targets must pass opposed Wisdom or fall asleep (cannot be woken until time expires).
Fully heal target's trauma and restore to full HP.
Up to 6 allies become unrecognizable/hidden unless they attack or make a scene. Not in combat.
All enemies see a horrific image; they must attack you, have Disadvantage, and -4 on all rolls against you.

name: Burn Control
description: Control, create, and manipulate fire. Risky, but powerful for damage and utility.

levels.effect: Add 1d4 Thermal damage to Unarmed/Melee attack. Take 2 Thermal damage.
Take half Thermal damage (rounded down), including self-inflicted.
Throw fireball for 1d6 Thermal damage; take 2 Thermal damage.
+2 Armor, deal 1d4 Thermal to melee attackers, ignite touched objects, damage self/armor each round.
Slow falls; from 60ft+ take half, <60ft take none. Gain advantage on Con challenge.
Ignite flammable object, giving it the Ignited status.
Explosive area fire attack (see rules for details).

levels.uses: Powers in Burn Control รท 2 per day
levels.effect: Absorb fire to regain HP; removes Ignited from allies. Attacks of opportunity may be triggered.
Sense heat through walls. Lose normal vision, -2 on perception involving sight.

levels.range: Touch (60ft if have Thermal Vision/I Have No Matches)
levels.effect: Heat metal to melting; target takes 1d10 Thermal if touching. Take 4 Thermal damage unless immune.
Replace a fuel source. Must rest after, for double duration used.
Engulf target in fire, 1d8/3 per power in Burn Control; Ignited status; take 4 Thermal damage.
Blast of fire, similar to Engulf.

levels.duration: As long as target is restrained
levels.uses: Powers in Burn Control รท 3 per day
levels.effect: Drain heat from restrained target: deal 1d6 Thermal, heal self for same amount.
All Burn Control damage dice increased (d4>d6, d6>d8, etc), d12 gets +4. Also take +2 self-damage.
Fly 40ft +5ft per 4 powers. Take 2 Thermal every 5 min.
Resurrects you at full HP, lose most powers for 2 days, damage taken doubled until full recovery.
Massive explosion. 1d12/Power unlocked in Burn Control. Take 14 damage and lose all powers for a day.
Immune to all Thermal damage, including self-inflicted.

name: Teleportation
description: Move yourself and others instantly. Includes phasing, movement, and mass teleport.

levels.effect: Teleport up to half your movement as your move action.
Advantage on Dex rolls involving movement, height, or ledges.
Teleport two touched targets (willing or contested Dex roll if not).
Phase through objects, can't breathe or use items inside.
Become nearly invisible, gain Hidden status after using Blink.
Always land on feet from <30ft, tumble to standing when knocked prone on Dex check.
Attack after teleporting behind a target (no action, no -5 to Called Shot/Strike that turn).
Shove adjacent target into object (opposed Con roll); target suffocates and takes growing damage.
Open portal to perform an action at distance you can see.
Touch wall/floor to sense all solid objects in this and adjacent room.
+7 AR, create 2 images; missed attacks Confuse attacker.
Blink distance increases by 5ft for each power in Teleportation.

levels.uses: Powers in Teleportation รท 3 per day
levels.effect: Teleport back to your last position within 6 sec (2 rounds).
Activate Meld instantly; immune to ballistic/kinetic/vibro weapons. +1 AR per 3 powers.
Teleport small inanimate objects. With Meshing: teleport object inside a target for 2d8 ignoring AR.

levels.uses: Once to go and once to return
levels.effect: Teleport anywhere on a planet (need image/name/idea of destination; not usable in combat).
Teleport yourself and willing targets/objects up to 1 mile. (not in combat)
Teleport self, all allies, and a ship or large object to any known location (uses all powers, see full rules).
